p: A recent study (LIPOGAIN) [ 36, 37] conducted on young, healthy, average-weight and slightly overweight subjects (Body mass index (BMI) 18–27 kg/m²) highlights that the consumption of desserts prepared with palm oil causes a more atherogenic lipoprotein profile, a doubling of visceral fat and a significant increase of hepatic steatosis compared with the use of sunflower oil.
